description:
Manchin Injury Law Group

Located in Fairmont, West Virginia, the Manchin Injury Law Group has been representing clients in personal injury matters for more than 25 years. With the potential to disrupt your life, a motor vehicle crash or workplace accident can have long-term physical, financial and emotional consequences. Contact our attentive and compassionate attorneys to secure representation that can help you begin moving forward.

In helping individuals and their families from all across West Virginia, our firm believes in a client-focused methodology that allows for clear and ethical legal advice. Building more than just an attorney-client partnership, we treat everyone who comes through our doors like family. We want to hear your side of the story, gather the facts and assist you in making a case toward achieving the best possible.

Many clients come to us feeling isolated, alone, and without an ally against the insurance companies. We make a point of ensuring that each client understands his or her rights, receives due medical care, and feels empowered to pursue decisive action in his or her personal injury case. Though personal injury law may seem nuanced and complex, the lawyers of the Manchin Injury Law Group possess the skills and knowledge to handle the unique circumstances and priorities of each case they see. Ranging from personal injury cases involving ATV and UTV accidents, car or truck crashes, medical malpractice, insurance bad faith cases, to premises liability as well as divorces, we stay by your side to ensure you don't stand alone.

If you or a loved one has been involved in a motor vehicle or workplace-related accident in West Virginia, let us know about it. Reach out to us for a free initial consultation; share your story.
